title: minecraft:behavior.avoid_mob_type 1.8.0
description: Allows this entity to avoid certain mob types.

max_dist.description: Maximum distance to look for an entity

max_flee.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it should stop fleeing.

walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster

sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for running speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the running speed faster

probability_per_strength.description: Determines how likely it is that this entity will stop avoiding another entity based on that entity's strength

ignore_visibility.description: If true, visbility between this entity and the mob type will not be checked.
